title: Make Azir's Back Soldiers Faster Pls
body:
I'm not saying Azir isn't strong, or that his soldiers need too much love, but playing him, I find that when you have more than one soldier down, they can be unreliable to hit if the targets too far away. 
I Propose; If it's possible to make Soldiers further away from the target location Move Faster towards the location, so roughly, all the soldiers end up at the location the same time.

replies.body:
Right now he's heavily focused on area control, and as such hardly countered by mobility, a strength that most mid champions share at the moment.
Not to say he's weak - his damage is WOW, and if you're caught in a bad moment you're basically screwed, but i'm saying that what you just described IS his core weakness. If you got rid of that, Rito would have to remove some of his strength to make up for it.
